column4: when opening gnome, it stops on openin "metacity" process, then don't complete openin gnome process. I reinstalled metacity and nautilus with no result, what can i do now?
ok, i'll try then i'll tell you what happens
when trying "dpkg-reconfigure metacity", i have that answer:enable to initialyze interface Gnome
It's also written " (DISPLAY problem?) "  and " use interface Dialog instead"
I have the same error message
debconf: Utilisation de l'interface Dialog  la place
